## Introduction

[Lonboard](https://developmentseed.org/lonboard/latest/) is a Python library for fast, interactive geospatial vector data visualization in Jupyter. But it also works with Panel.

For more info check out the [Lonboard-Panel guide](https://developmentseed.org/lonboard/latest/ecosystem/panel/).
